bibl.title: Dipinti on the Temenos Wall at Deir el-Haggar (Dakhla Oasis). Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Dakhleh Oasis Project, 1992-1993. Clearance work at the temple of Deir el-Haggar revealed a doorway through the temenos wall with its reveals covered with dipinti from the second century C.E. - I. The Inscriptions [1-16: mainly proskynemata]. - II. Pictorial Dipinti [17-26: gods and sacred animals]. - III. The Relationship between the texts and the images.
bibl.seg: KAPER Olaf E. and Klaas A. WORP, Dipinti on the Temenos Wall at Deir el-Haggar (Dakhla Oasis). Avec résumé en anglais.
